tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Determination and grit allow all attacks to be dodged.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: With a mighty sweep, Lü Bu strikes all around him.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: The tyrant rages; his men hold through fear.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: An outnumbered army will fight even harder. Skill trumps numbers.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: A soldier always fights better when they know their sides and rear are protected.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: A soldier always fights better when they know their sides and rear are protected.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: A war cry from one warrior to another.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: A war cry from one warrior to another.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: These words will bring shame and humiliation.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: These words will bring shame and humiliation.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Where others see rocks and trees, you see advantages.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: Where others see rocks and trees, you see advantages.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: It is not always the command that motivates, but the way it is given.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: It is not always the command that motivates, but the way it is given.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: A master of the battlefield can undermine even the surest of soldiers.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: A master of the battlefield can undermine even the surest of soldiers.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Knowing when best to shoot is most effective when you are the one being shot at.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: Knowing when best to shoot is most effective when you are the one being shot at.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: A lifetime spent learning the ways of heaven will turn thoughts into belief.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: A lifetime spent learning the ways of heaven will turn thoughts into belief.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: A warrior will only fight at their best when they are sure-footed.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: A warrior will only fight at their best when they are sure-footed.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Sometimes it's not what you hit or how hard, but where.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: Sometimes it's not what you hit or how hard, but where.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: If you can conquer the mind of the enemy then half the battle is won.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: If you can conquer the mind of the enemy then half the battle is won.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: True strength lies not in the mind or body, but within the spirit.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: True strength lies not in the mind or body, but within the spirit.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Look up and you will see the sky; look inward and you will see heaven.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: Look up and you will see the sky; look inward and you will see heaven.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Generations working the land will breed a kinship with it.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: Generations working the land will breed a kinship with it.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Knowing your brothers will never abandon you brings tremendous comfort.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: Knowing your brothers will never abandon you brings tremendous comfort.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: These words will fortify the spirit.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: These words will fortify the spirit.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: Superficial cuts and bruises can quickly be recovered from with bandages, sutures and medicine.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: Superficial cuts and bruises can quickly be recovered from with bandages, sutures and medicine.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: The land is not just the earth, but the forests and mountains, and all the hidden, ancient places.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: The land is not just the earth, but the forests and mountains, and all the hidden, ancient places.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: When the opportunity is right let discipline be second to the unconventional.

unit_abilities.tooltip_text: When the opportunity is right let discipline be second to the unconventional.

tooltip_text.last_approved_text: An ancient chant that serves as a reminder that Heaven is with the virtuous.
